testcase.name: Login with valid data
testcase.system-out: Given site address as hrm page..............................................passed When user enter valid username as "Admin"...................................passed And user enter valid password as "admin123".................................passed And user click on login button..............................................passed Then Verify Admin tab displayed.............................................passed And logout from HRM Application.............................................passed

testcase.name: Login Functionality
testcase.system-out: Given user navigates to the website javatpoint.com..........................passed And there user logs in through Login Window by using Username as "USER" and Password as "PASSWORD".passed Then login must be successful...............................................passed

testcase.name: Verifying login with invalid data
testcase.system-out: Given site address as facebook..............................................passed When user enter invalid username............................................passed And user enter invalid password.............................................passed And click on login button...................................................passed Then verify error message is displayed......................................passed

testcase.name: Verifying login with blank data
testcase.system-out: Given site address as facebook..............................................passed When user enter valid username..............................................passed And user leave password as blank............................................passed And click on login button...................................................passed Then verify password error message displayed................................passed
